title: Dearest and loveliest most wonderful Riot
body:
My love, my life, my everything Rito...

If ever you cared for me

If ever your love was returned, if you ever felt the same way about me

If you really want to make this work,
please, unlock Braum, the heart of the Frejlord.

Never have I felt this way in my life about a new champion, most especially a new support. You must understand, my love for you Roit is eternal, but this is a new kind of passion, a fire deep inside.

I must have him.

Someday, you will understand. For now, I ask only that you honor my one request of you. Here is a short poem so you will know the depth of my affection:

His mustache fierce, a beacon of security/ Would that he noticed me, drifting to obscurity/ My very Essence drawn to his gruff voice/ my heart's in Flux, I have no choice/ This Barrage of feelings, Unbreakable and true/ Don't let a Fissure come between me and you/ Stand Behind Me, be my companion/ Goodbye Taric, now Braum's my champion.

Sincerely,

-=Ezreal

replies.body: Taric needs an up-to-date look. His look is "outrageous".
Taric must be responsible for the broken horn from Braum's shield.
I will draw it for you......that is, if I get some RP~ <3
Well, {{champion:44}} will certainly be taking this well.

That was beautiful man...

CHASE YOUR DREAMS!
